Package business.entities

Class Wizard

java.lang.Object
business.entities.Character
business.entities.Wizard
public class Wizard extends Character
Class representing a wizard in the application's business model.

It stores the wizard's shield and has different methods and actions unique to the wizard class.

As a Character, it holds their name, player, xp, stats and class.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Wizard

      public Wizard(String name, String player, int xp, int body, int mind, int spirit, String class_)
      Constructor with name, player, xp, body, mind, spirit and class parameters, for new wizards.
      Parameters:
      name - a string representation of the wizard's name
      player - a string representation of the wizard's owner
      xp - an int representation of the wizard's experience points
      body - an int representation of the wizard's body stat
      mind - an int representation of the wizard's mind stat
      spirit - an int representation of the wizard's spirit stat
      class_ - a string representation of the wizard's class

  • Method Details

    • setInitiative

      public void setInitiative()
      Setter for the wizard's initiative value which uses a random value between 1 and 20 plus the wizard's mind stat.
      Overrides:
      setInitiative in class Character

      Overrides:

      Returns:
      an int representation of the character's increase in the stat

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage, String damageType)
      Method that makes the wizard take damage. If it is magical damage, it will be reduced by the wizard's level. The wizard will first take damage from its shield and then from its health points.
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class Character
      Parameters:
      damage - an int representation of the damage the character will take
      damageType - a string representation of the damage type the character will take

    • getTarget

      public int[] getTarget(ArrayList<Character> adventureParty, ArrayList<Monster> monsters, int[] targets)
      Method that makes the wizard decide which monster(s) to target. It depends on the number of live monsters.
      Overrides:
      getTarget in class Character
      Parameters:
      adventureParty - an array list of characters
      monsters - an array list of monsters
      targets - an array of integers that represent the combatants that are targeted
      Returns:
      an array of integers that represent the combatants that are targeted

    • getDamage

      public int getDamage(int hit, int size)
      Method that makes the wizard decide how much damage it will deal. It depends on the number of live monsters.
      Overrides:
      getDamage in class Character
      Parameters:
      hit - an int representation of a d10 roll which determines if the attack is a hit, a critical hit or a miss
      size - an int representation of how many monsters are left in the encounter
